skin.name: fixed-l
skin.description: Use system decorations while stretching display, with base height of 1024 pixels

skin.name: fixed-m
skin.description: Use system decorations while stretching display, with base height of 568 pixels

skin.name: fixed-s
skin.description: Use system decorations while stretching display, with base height of 480 pixels

skin.name: pad-w
skin.description: A wide big screen resolution (800x1280) skin

skin.name: phone-s
skin.description: A short small screen resolution (320x480) skin

skin.name: system-l
skin.description: Use system decorations and a resizable display, while keeping PPI, for a large display

skin.name: system-o
skin.description: Use system decorations and a resizable display, while keeping PPI, for a small display

skin.name: system-s
skin.description: Use system decorations and a resizable display, while keeping PPI, for a small display
